page.title: 09A Lanesfield child's day
page.content: Last Friday I was ill. I got up at half past nine and went downstairs to have breakfast. I had Rice Krispies and a cup of tea. Back upstairs I watched TV. On Central there was as a programme called "Sport Billy" so I switched to BBC 2 and saw Snooker. Soon my mother called me to go to ASDA stores with her. When there I selected the best trolley. At first we went round the Toy Department, then around the clothes My mother bought me a grey body warmer coat it had BMX on the top. Next we got butter and cheese,bacon and sausage. When we got back home I called for my friend Darren. We went to play by the brook. We climbed up the sides of the bank. At night we went out at the front of my house to play "SPY". We went indoors at 11-30 p.m. Then I went to bed but I could not sleep. I am ten years old.
